message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get a unique item at a fixed price. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. What do you say, are you in?
I appreciate your confidence, but given the uncertainty about the product quality, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.
